scripts.clean: rimraf -vf lib/**/*.js && rimraf -vf lib/**/*.d.ts && rimraf -vf bin/**/*.js && rimraf -vf lib/**/*.d.ts
scripts.synth:poc: npm run build:poc && NODE_ENV=poc cdk synth '*'
scripts.synth:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=dev cdk synth '*'
scripts.synth:uat: npm run build:uat && NODE_ENV=uat cdk synth '*'
scripts.synth:prod: npm run build:prod && NODE_ENV=production cdk synth '*'
scripts.synth:ops360-demo: npm run build:ops360-demo && NODE_ENV=ops360-demo cdk synth '*'
scripts.deploy:poc: npm run build:poc && cross-env NODE_ENV=poc cdk deploy '*' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev cdk deploy '*' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:uat: npm run build:uat && cross-env NODE_ENV=uat cdk deploy '*' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cdk deploy '*' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:ops360-demo: npm run build:ops360-demo && cross-env NODE_ENV=ops360-demo cdk deploy '*' --require-approval never
